channel.title: Version 5.9 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.9.4 (2023-01-23) Fixes [bug] variant: fix search ay'con an' text color #437 5.9.3 (2023-01-22) Fixes [bug] nav: fix left/right navigat'n fer horizontal scroll'n #435 [bug][break'n] theme: allow planks on top level #434 Maintenance [task] build: switch t' wildcard version o' act'ns #428 5.9.2 (2022-12-30) Fixes [bug] search: apply dependency scripts fer Hindi an' Japanese #427 5.9.1 (2022-12-23) Enhancements [feature] theme: make external link target configur'ble #426 5.9.0 (2022-12-23) Enhancements [feature][change] theme: open external links 'n separate tab #419 [feature] theme: make it a Cap'n Hugo module #417 Fixes [bug][change] attachments: fix incorrect links fer defaultContentLanguageInSubdir=true #425
